dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Oh, não...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Is everything ok?
dialogue.translation: Está tudo bem?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: No! We've hit some kind of interference...
dialogue.translation: Não! Encontrámos uma anomalia...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Something's wrong! We're going to crash!
dialogue.translation: Passa-se alguma coisa! Vamos colidir!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Everyone off the ship!
dialogue.translation: Abandonem todos a nave!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This shouldn't be happening!
dialogue.translation: Como é que isto aconteceu!?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Phew! That was scary!
dialogue.translation: Ufa! Apanhei cá um susto!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: At least we all escaped, right guys?
dialogue.translation: Pelo menos safámo-nos! Não é, pessoal?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder why the ship teleported me here alone?
dialogue.translation: Porque será que a nave apenas me teletransportou a mim para aqui?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope everyone else got out ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que o resto do pessoal se tenha safado...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Violet! Is that you?
dialogue.translation: És tu, Violeta?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Comandante! Estás bem!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Something has gone horribly wrong with the ship's teleporter!
dialogue.translation: O teletransporte da nave vacilou à grande!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think everyone has been teleported away randomly! They could be anywhere!
dialogue.translation: Acho que teletransportou aleatoriamente toda a tripulação! Podem ter ido parar sabe-se lá onde!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm on the ship - it's damaged badly, but it's still intact!
dialogue.translation: Estou na nave. Está muito maltratada, mas ainda está inteira!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Where are you, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Onde estás, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I'm on some sort of space station... It seems pretty modern...
dialogue.translation: Isto parece uma espécie de estação espacial... Até parece bem moderna...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There seems to be some sort of interference in this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Esta dimensão parece ter uma espécie de anomalia...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm broadcasting the coordinates of the ship to you now.
dialogue.translation: Vou transmitir-te as coordenadas da nave.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I can't teleport you back, but...
dialogue.translation: Não consigo é teletransportar-te, mas...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If YOU can find a teleporter anywhere nearby, you should be able to teleport back to me!
dialogue.translation: Se encontrares para aí algum teletransporte, talvez sirva para vires ter comigo!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll try to find one!
dialogue.translation: OK! Vou ver se encontro um!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Good luck, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Boa sorte, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll keep trying to find the rest of the crew...
dialogue.translation: Vou ver se encontro o resto da tripulação...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if no trinkets found yet

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ohh! I wonder what that is?
dialogue.translation: Oh! O que será aquilo?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Não me deve fazer falta, mas podia recolher aquilo para pesquisar na nave...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if other trinket already found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh! It's another one of those shiny things!
dialogue.translation: Oh! Outra daquelas fichas brilhantes!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Não me deve fazer falta, mas podia recolher aquilo para pesquisar na nave...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Um teletransporte!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I can get back to the ship with this!
dialogue.translation: Posso usá-lo para regressar à nave!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, Doctor - have you any idea what caused the crash?
dialogue.translation: Então, doutora... Já descobriste o motivo da colisão?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's some sort of bizarre signal here that's interfering with our equipment...
dialogue.translation: Anda para aqui um sinal estranho a interferir com o nosso equipamento...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It caused the ship to lose its quantum position, collapsing us into this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Fez com que a nave perdesse o posicionamento quântico e se estatelasse nesta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: But I think we should be able to fix the ship and get out of here...
dialogue.translation: No entanto, devemos conseguir concertar a nave e pirar-nos daqui...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... as long as we can find the rest of the crew.
dialogue.translation: Temos é de encontrar o resto da tripulação, primeiro.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We really don't know anything about this place...
dialogue.translation: Não sabemos rigorosamente nada deste local...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Our friends could be anywhere - they could be lost, or in danger!
dialogue.translation: O resto da tripulação, os nossos amigos... Podem ter-se perdido, ou até estar em perigo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Can they teleport back here?
dialogue.translation: Eles não poderiam teletransportar-se de volta?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Not unless they find some way to communicate with us!
dialogue.translation: Se arranjarem uma forma de comunicar connosco!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We can't pick up their signal and they can't teleport here unless they know where the ship is...
dialogue.translation: Não deteto o sinal de ninguém e só poderão teletransportar-se se souberem o paradeiro da nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So what do we do?
dialogue.translation: O que podemos fazer?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We need to find them! Head out into the dimension and look for anywhere they might have ended up...
dialogue.translation: Temos de encontrá-los! Vai lá fora explorar a dimensão e tenta descobrir onde poderão estar...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! Where do we start?
dialogue.translation: OK! Começamos por onde?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Well, I've been trying to find them with the ship's scanners!
dialogue.translation: Bem, eu tenho andado a tentar localizá-los com a sonda da nave!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It's not working, but I did find something...
dialogue.translation: Não localizei ninguém, mas encontrei algo...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: These points show up on our scans as having high energy patterns!
dialogue.translation: A sonda está a ler elevados padrões de energia nestes pontos!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's a good chance they're teleporters - which means they're probably built near something important...
dialogue.translation: É bem possível que sejam teletransportes e, se forem... Devem ter sido construídos perto de algo importante...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: They could be a very good place to start looking.
dialogue.translation: Seria um bom ponto de partida para iniciar as buscas.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll head out and see what I can find!
dialogue.translation: OK! Vou lá ver se encontro algo, então.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Fico por aqui, se precisares de algo!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Fico por aqui, se precisares de algo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed, Doctor.
dialogue.translation: Doutora, já tenho a cabeça a andar à roda...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where do I begin?
dialogue.translation: É melhor começar por onde?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press ENTER to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Não te esqueças que podes premir ENTER para verificar a tua localização no mapa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press {b_map} to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Não te esqueças que podes premir {b_map} para verificar a tua localização no mapa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look for areas where the rest of the crew might be...
dialogue.translation: Investiga áreas onde o resto da tripulação possa estar...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you get lost, you can get back to the ship from any teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Se te perderes, basta usar um teletransporte para regressar à nave.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: And don't worry! We'll find everyone!
dialogue.translation: E não te preocupes, tenho a certeza que encontraremos toda a gente!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vai ficar tudo bem!

cutscene.explanation: only one player string is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Tudo bem contigo, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Victoria, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Não consigo parar de preocupar-me com a Verónica, doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vitellary, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Não consigo parar de preocupar-me com o Vitelino, doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Verdigris, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Não consigo parar de preocupar-me com o Verdusco, doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vermilion, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Não consigo parar de preocupar-me com o Vermelhão, doutora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about you, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Não consigo parar de preocupar-me contigo!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh - well, don't worry, they'll show up!
dialogue.translation: Ah, bem... Não te preocupes! Encontraremos toda a gente!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Here! Have a lollipop!
dialogue.translation: Toma! Aceita este chupa-chupa!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store anything I find out there...
dialogue.translation: Parece um local ideal para guardar tudo o que encontrar nas buscas...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: A Verónica adora pesquisar as coisas interessantes que encontramos nas aventuras!

cutscene.explanation: if at least one trinket found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store those shiny things.
dialogue.translation: Parece um local ideal para guardar aquelas fichas brilhantes.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: A Verónica adora pesquisar as coisas interessantes que encontramos nas aventuras!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que esteja bem...

cutscene.explanation: nuance: `she's BACK on the ship` means more `she's home` and not `she has returned to the ship`. She has never left the ship

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been so worried!
dialogue.translation: Comandante! Já tinha os nervos em franja!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Estás com boa cara, Chefe Verdusco!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I've been trying to get out, but I keep going around in circles...
dialogue.translation: Estava a tentar sair daqui, mas ando para aqui às voltas...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I've come from the ship. I'm here to teleport you back to it.
dialogue.translation: Já estive na nave. Venho teletransportar-te de volta.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Is everyone else alright? Is Violet...
dialogue.translation: O resto da tripulação está bem? A Violeta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine - she's back on the ship!
dialogue.translation: Está ótima. Está na nave!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh! Great - Let's get going, then!
dialogue.translation: Ah, ótimo!... Vamos andando, então!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! Captain! Are you stuck here too?
dialogue.translation: Oh, não! Também andas aqui às voltas, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's ok - I'm here to rescue you!
dialogue.translation: Descansa... Vim resgatar-te!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let me explain everything...
dialogue.translation: Eu explico tudo...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? I didn't understand any of that!
dialogue.translation: Hã!? Não percebi nadinha de nada!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... well, don't worry.
dialogue.translation: Ah, bem... Não te preocupes.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! Everything will be alright!
dialogue.translation: Segue-me! Vai ficar tudo bem!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Sniff... Really?
dialogue.translation: A... a sério?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Então, está bem!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Am I ever glad to see you! I thought I was the only one to escape the ship...
dialogue.translation: Estou tão contente por te ver! Pensava que só eu é que tinha conseguido evacuar da nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion! I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vermelhão! Sabia que conseguias safar-te!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: So, what's the situation?
dialogue.translation: Então qual é o ponto da situação?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I see! Well, we'd better get back then.
dialogue.translation: Ah, estou a ver! Então é melhor irmos andando.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: There's a teleporter in the next room.
dialogue.translation: Há um teletransporte na sala seguinte.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, Viridian! You got off the ship alright too?
dialogue.translation: Olá, Verdete! Conseguiste evacuar da nave sem problemas?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's good to see you're alright, Professor!
dialogue.translation: Professor! Bons olhos te vejam!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Is the ship ok?
dialogue.translation: A nave safou-se?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's badly damaged, but Violet's been working on fixing it.
dialogue.translation: Está muito maltratada, mas a Violeta anda de roda dela para concertá-la.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We could really use your help...
dialogue.translation: A tua ajuda vinha mesmo a calhar...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, of course!
dialogue.translation: Sim, claro!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: The background interference in this dimension prevented the ship from finding a teleporter when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Há uma anomalia nesta dimensão. Causou uma interferência de fundo que impediu a nave de localizar teletransportes durante a colisão!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We've all been teleported to different locations!
dialogue.translation: A tripulação foi teletransportada por toda a parte!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Er, that sounds about right!
dialogue.translation: P-Pois, foi basicamente isso!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's get back to the ship, then!
dialogue.translation: Então, vamos lá regressar à nave!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Tu primeiro, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Mas que...!?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Are you ok?
dialogue.translation: Comandante! Estás bem?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm ok... this... this isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Estou, pois... Mas... Isto não é a nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Onde estamos?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Mas que...!?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Something's gone wrong... We should look for a way back!
dialogue.translation: Passou-se alguma coisa... É melhor arranjarmos uma forma de regressar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! I'll help you!
dialogue.translation: Eu ajudo, vem comigo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Promise you won't leave without me!
dialogue.translation: Tens é de prometer que não vais embora sem mim!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I promise! Don't worry!
dialogue.translation: Prometo, pois! Não te preocupes!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you ok down there, Doctor?
dialogue.translation: Tudo bem aí em baixo, doutora?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wanna go home!
dialogue.translation: Quero voltar para casa!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Where are we? How did we even get here?
dialogue.translation: Onde estamos? Como é que viemos aqui parar?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Well, Violet did say that the interference in the dimension we crashed in was causing problems with the teleporters...
dialogue.translation: Bem, a Violeta disse que colidimos com uma anomalia desta dimensão e interferiu com os teletransportes...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I guess something went wrong...
dialogue.translation: Diria que algo correu mal...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: But if we can find another teleporter, I think we can get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Mas devemos conseguir regressar à nave se encontrarmos outro teletransporte!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Vou chorar...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Captain! Wait for me!
dialogue.translation: Comandante! Comandante! Espera por mim!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Please don't leave me behind! I don't mean to be a burden!
dialogue.translation: Não me deixes para trás! Prometo que não vou estorvar!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm scared!
dialogue.translation: Tenho medo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... don't worry Victoria, I'll look after you!
dialogue.translation: Ora... Não te preocupes, Verónica. Eu cuido de ti!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're never going to get out of here, are we?
dialogue.translation: Vamos ficar aqui para sempre, não vamos?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I.. I don't know...
dialogue.translation: E-Eu.. Eu sei lá...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know where we are or how we're going to get out...
dialogue.translation: Não sei onde estamos, nem como poderemos sair daqui...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're going to be lost forever!
dialogue.translation: Vamos estar perdidos para sempre!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok, come on... Things aren't that bad.
dialogue.translation: Espera, tem calma... A situação não é assim tão má.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I have a feeling that we're nearly home!
dialogue.translation: Algo me diz que estamos quase em casa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We can't be too far from another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Devemos andar perto de outro teletransporte!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope you're right, captain...
dialogue.translation: Espero que tenhas razão, comandante...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! You were right! It's a teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Um teletransporte! Tinhas razão, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Phew! You had me worried for a while there... I thought we were never going to find one.
dialogue.translation: Ufa! Começava a preocupar-me... Já duvidava se viríamos a encontrar algum.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? Really?
dialogue.translation: Hã? A sério?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Anyway, let's go back to the ship.
dialogue.translation: De qualquer modo, é melhor regressarmos à nave.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Huh? This isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Hã!? Isto não é a nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! What's going on?
dialogue.translation: Comandante! O que se passa?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I... I don't know!
dialogue.translation: N-Não sei...!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Onde estamos?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Uh oh, this isn't good... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não... Não estou a gostar disto... Algo correu mal com o teletransporte!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok... no need to panic!
dialogue.translation: OK... Não vale a pena entrar em pânico!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's look for another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Vamos procurar outro teletransporte!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go this way!
dialogue.translation: Vamos por aqui!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Tu primeiro, comandante!

cutscene.explanation: just like in rescuegreen, `Violet is back on the ship` does not mean she was ever off the ship and has *returned* to it. Or maybe Verdigris thinks Violet was warped off the ship as well just like him and she *has* made her way back to the ship?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So Violet's back on the ship? She's really ok?
dialogue.translation: Então, a Violeta está na nave? Ela está bem?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine! She helped me find my way back!
dialogue.translation: Está ótima! Até me orientou de volta para a nave!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh, phew! I was worried about her.
dialogue.translation: Ah, ufa! Estava preocupado com ela.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain, I have a secret...
dialogue.translation: Comandante, tenho um segredo...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I really like Violet!
dialogue.translation: Gosto muito da Violeta!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is that so?
dialogue.translation: A sério?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Please promise you won't tell her!
dialogue.translation: Por favor, promete que não lhe contas!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hey again!
dialogue.translation: Olá de novo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Tudo bem contigo?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think so! I really hope we can find a way back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Acho que sim! Espero bem que consigamos regressar à nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So, about Violet...
dialogue.translation: Ah, sobre a Violeta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um, yeah?
dialogue.translation: Hum, sim?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Do you have any advice?
dialogue.translation: Tens alguma dica?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um... you should... be yourself!
dialogue.translation: Ah... Age... naturalmente!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Thanks Captain!
dialogue.translation: Obrigado, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, do you think you'll be able to fix the ship?
dialogue.translation: Achas mesmo que consegues consertar a nave?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Depends on how bad it is... I think so, though!
dialogue.translation: Vai depender dos estragos... Mas acho que sim!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It's not very hard, really. The basic dimensional warping engine design is pretty simple, and if we can get that working we shouldn't have any trouble getting home.
dialogue.translation: Sinceramente, não deve ser muito difícil. O conceito do motor de dobra espacial dimensional até é bem simples. Se arranjarmos uma forma de fazê-lo funcionar, devemos regressar a casa num piscar de olhos.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh! Good!
dialogue.translation: Ah, boa!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Finally! A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Um teletransporte! Até que enfim!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I was getting worried we wouldn't find one...
dialogue.translation: Já não tinha a certeza se voltaríamos a ver um...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's head back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Está na hora de regressar à nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Wow! Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Uau! Onde estamos?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This... isn't right... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Há... aqui algo errado... Deve ter acontecido alguma coisa com o teletransporte!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Oh well... We can work it out when we get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ora, bolas... Podemos analisar a situação depois de regressar à nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's go exploring!
dialogue.translation: Vamos explorar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Está bem!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Aye aye, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Afirmativo, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Viridian... how did the crash happen, exactly?
dialogue.translation: Ó Verdete... Sabes, ao certo, o que causou a colisão?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh, I don't really know - some sort of interference...
dialogue.translation: Sinceramente, nem sei... Algum tipo de anomalia...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...or something sciencey like that. It's not really my area.
dialogue.translation: Ou outra cena científica desse género. Não sou especialista no assunto.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Ah! Well, do you think we'll be able to fix the ship and go home?
dialogue.translation: Ah! Sabes, ao menos, se vamos conseguir consertar a nave para voltar a casa?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Of course! Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vamos, pois! Vai ficar tudo bem!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hi again! You doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Olá de novo! Tudo bem contigo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I think so! But I really want to get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Acho que sim! Mas gostava mesmo de regressar à nave...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll be ok! If we can find a teleporter somewhere we should be able to get back!
dialogue.translation: Nós safamo-nos! Só precisamos de localizar um teletransporte para regressar!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Are we there yet?
dialogue.translation: Ainda falta muito?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're getting closer, I think...
dialogue.translation: Estamos quase lá... acho eu...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I hope...
dialogue.translation: Espero eu...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I wonder where we are, anyway?
dialogue.translation: Mas onde será que estamos?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This seems different from that dimension we crashed in, somehow...
dialogue.translation: De certa forma, este local parece diferente da dimensão com que colidimos...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I dunno... But we must be close to a teleporter by now...
dialogue.translation: Não sei... Mas já devíamos estar próximos de um teletransporte...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're there!
dialogue.translation: Cá está ele!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: See? I told you! Let's get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Eu não disse? Vamos lá regressar à nave!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oooh! This is interesting...
dialogue.translation: Oooh! Que interessante...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you been here before?
dialogue.translation: Já estiveste aqui, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Hã? Onde estamos?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I suspect something deflected our teleporter transmission! This is somewhere new...
dialogue.translation: Acho que os nossos dados do teletransporte foram divergidos! Nunca estivemos aqui...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We should try to find a teleporter and get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: É melhor procurarmos um teletransporte para regressar à nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Right behind you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Vou mesmo atrás, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What do you make of all this, Professor?
dialogue.translation: O que achas disto, professor?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm guessing this dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash!
dialogue.translation: Diria que esta dimensão deve ter algo a ver com a anomalia que causou a colisão!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the cause of it here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez encontremos aqui a causa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh wow! Really?
dialogue.translation: Hã? A sério!?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Well, it's just a guess. I'll need to get back to the ship before I can do any real tests...
dialogue.translation: Bom, é uma possibilidade, mas preciso de regressar à nave para analisar melhor...

cutscene.explanation: the split paths merge, and Vitellary sees a checkpoint

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ohh! What was that?
dialogue.translation: Oooh! O que foi aquilo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What was what?
dialogue.translation: O que foi aquilo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That big... C thing! I wonder what it does?
dialogue.translation: Aquele... ''C'' grande! Para que será?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Em... I don't really know how to answer that question...
dialogue.translation: Hum... Sinceramente, nem sei o que te diga...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's probably best not to acknowledge that it's there at all.
dialogue.translation: É melhor fazermos de conta que nem o vimos.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we should take it back to the ship to study it?
dialogue.translation: E se o levássemos para a nave para analisá-lo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We really shouldn't think about it too much... Let's keep moving!
dialogue.translation: Não devíamos perder tempo precioso com isto... Vamos mas é continuar!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: You know, there's something really odd about this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Já reparaste que esta dimensão parece mesmo estranha?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Ai sim?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We shouldn't really be able to move between dimensions with a regular teleporter...
dialogue.translation: Não devia ser possível usar teletransportes para saltar entre dimensões...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe this isn't a proper dimension at all?
dialogue.translation: Talvez isto não seja bem outra dimensão?...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe it's some kind of polar dimension? Something artificially created for some reason?
dialogue.translation: E se for uma espécie de dimensão polar? Algo criado artificialmente por algum motivo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I can't wait to get back to the ship. I have a lot of tests to run!
dialogue.translation: Quero tanto regressar à nave. Tenho tantas análises para fazer!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder if there's anything else in this dimension worth exploring?
dialogue.translation: Será que vale a pena explorar mais alguma coisa nesta dimensão?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe... but we should probably just focus on finding the rest of the crew for now...
dialogue.translation: Talvez... Mas a nossa prioridade devia ser encontrar o resto da tripulação...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: At last!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's go back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: 'Bora para a nave!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Oh, não...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Outra vez, não!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Victoria? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Onde estás, Verónica?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Espera um pouco, eu salvo-te!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Verdigris? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Verdusco? Onde andas?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Aguenta-te! Já te salvo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vermelhão! Estás onde?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Espera aí que já te ajudo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vitellary? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vitelino, onde estás?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Eu salvo-te, espera aí!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I think I'm going to be sick...
dialogue.translation: Acho que vou passar mal...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Ai que zonzeira...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Phew! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Ufa, estás bem!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Ai a minha cabeça...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Again! Let's go again!
dialogue.translation: Outra vez! Vá lá!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Está tudo a andar à roda...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That was interesting, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Foi uma experiência interessante, não foi?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Acho que vou vomitar...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... I hope Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Espero que o Verdusco esteja bem.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you can find him, he'd be a big help fixing the ship!
dialogue.translation: Daria uma ajuda preciosa a consertar a nave. Vê se o encontras!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris is so brave and ever so smart!
dialogue.translation: O Chefe Verdusco é tão corajoso... e transpira inteligência!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Bons olhos te vejam, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think Victoria is quite happy to be back on the ship.
dialogue.translation: Diria que a Verónica adorou regressar à nave.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: She really doesn't like adventuring. She gets very homesick!
dialogue.translation: Não liga muito a aventuras, fica logo com saudades de casa!

cutscene.explanation: only one of the last 6 strings is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Vermilion called in to say hello!
dialogue.translation: O Vermelhão entrou em contacto para dar um ''olá''!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Está mortinho por ajudar a encontrar o resto da tripulação!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Victoria!
dialogue.translation: Está mortinho por ajudar a encontrar a Verónica!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vitellary!
dialogue.translation: Está mortinho por ajudar a encontrar o Vitelino!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Está mortinho por ajudar a encontrar o Verdusco!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vermilion!
dialogue.translation: Está mortinho por ajudar a encontrar o Vermelhão!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find you!
dialogue.translation: Está mortinho por ajudar a encontrar-te!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You found Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Comandante! Encontraste o Verdusco!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Thank you so much!
dialogue.translation: Muito obrigada!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm glad Professor Vitellary is ok!
dialogue.translation: Ainda bem que o Vitelino se safou!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He had lots of questions for me about this dimension.
dialogue.translation: Ele quer perguntar-me imensas coisas sobre esta dimensão.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's already gotten to work with his research!
dialogue.translation: Já começou a trabalhar na pesquisa dele!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange happened when we teleported back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doutora, aconteceu uma coisa estranha quando nos teletransportámos para a nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We got lost in another dimension!
dialogue.translation: Perdemo-nos noutra dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez esta dimensão tenha algo a ver com a anomalia que causou a colisão?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll look into it...
dialogue.translation: Vou analisar a possibilidade...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor! Doctor! It happened again!
dialogue.translation: Doutora, doutora! Voltou a acontecer!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The teleporter brought us to that weird dimension...
dialogue.translation: O teletransporte mandou-nos para uma dimensão muito estranha...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hum... Realmente passa-se algo muito estranho...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Se, ao menos, conseguíssemos identificar a origem da anomalia...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange has been happening when we teleport back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Doutora, acontece sempre algo estranho quando tentamos teletransportar-nos para a nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We keep getting brought to another weird dimension!
dialogue.translation: Vamos sempre parar a outra estranha dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez esta dimensão tenha algo a ver com a anomalia que causou a colisão?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hum... Realmente passa-se algo muito estranho...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Se, ao menos, conseguíssemos identificar a origem da anomalia...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hey Captain! Now that you've turned off the source of the interference, we can warp everyone back to the ship instantly, if we need to!
dialogue.translation: Conseguiste desativar a origem da anomalia, comandante! Assim, podemos teletransportar toda a gente de volta para a nave, se for preciso!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Any time you want to come back to the ship, just select the new SHIP option in your menu!
dialogue.translation: Sempre que desejes regressar à nave, bastar selecionar a opção NAVE no menu!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm an engineer!
dialogue.translation: Sou engenheiro!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think I can get this ship moving again, but it's going to take a while...
dialogue.translation: Devo conseguir voltar a por a nave a funcionar, mas vai levar algum tempo...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Victoria mentioned something about a lab? I wonder if she found anything down there?
dialogue.translation: A Verónica não tinha mencionado o laboratório? Será que encontrou alguma coisa lá em baixo?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Vermilion's back! Yey!
dialogue.translation: O Vermelhão voltou! Fixe!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The Professor had lots of questions about this dimension for me...
dialogue.translation: O professor queria perguntar-me imensas coisas sobre esta dimensão...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: We still don't really know that much, though.
dialogue.translation: Mas ainda não temos muitas informações...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Until we work out what's causing that interference, we can't go anywhere.
dialogue.translation: Não conseguimos sair daqui até descobrirmos a origem da anomalia.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm so glad that Violet's alright!
dialogue.translation: Ainda bem que a Violeta está sã e salva!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: That other dimension we ended up in must be related to this one, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Acho que, de certa forma, a dimensão onde fomos parar está relacionada com esta...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The antenna's broken! This is going to be very hard to fix...
dialogue.translation: A antena está partida! Isto vai dar uma trabalheira para consertar...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It looks like we were warped into solid rock when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Parece que fomos teletransportados para rocha sólida durante a colisão!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hmm. It's going to be hard to separate from this...
dialogue.translation: Hum... Vai ser complicado separarmo-nos disto...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The ship's all fixed up. We can leave at a moment's notice!
dialogue.translation: A nave está toda arranjadinha. Podemos ir embora quando quisermos!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Don't worry, Sir!
dialogue.translation: Não te preocupes!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll find a way out of here!
dialogue.translation: Vamos conseguir sair daqui!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I hope Victoria is ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que a Verónica esteja bem...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She doesn't handle surprises very well...
dialogue.translation: Ela não lida muito bem com surpresas...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I don't know how we're going to get this ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Duvido que consigamos fazer a nave funcionar novamente!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris would know what to do...
dialogue.translation: O Chefe Verdusco saberia o que fazer...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the ship to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Como é que uma colisão nos traria até aqui?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's the shame the Professor isn't here, huh? I'm sure he could work it out!
dialogue.translation: Se, ao menos, tivéssemos o professor aqui... Ele saberia o que fazer, não é verdade?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's great to be back!
dialogue.translation: Sabe tão bem estar de volta!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I can't wait to help you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Mal posso esperar por ajudar a encontrar o resto da tripulação!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It'll be like old times, huh, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Tal como antigamente! Não é, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's good to have Victoria back with us.
dialogue.translation: Ainda bem que temos a Verónica de volta.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She really seems happy to get back to work in her lab!
dialogue.translation: Ela parece andar toda contente a trabalhar no laboratório dela!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I think I saw Verdigris working on the outside of the ship!
dialogue.translation: Acho que vi o Verdusco a trabalhar no casco da nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: You found Professor Vitellary! All right!
dialogue.translation: Encontraste o Professor Vitelino! Boa!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll have this interference thing worked out in no time now!
dialogue.translation: Devemos estar prestes a solucionar o problema da anomalia!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: That other dimension was really strange, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: A outra dimensão era mesmo estranha, não era?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the teleporter to send us there?
dialogue.translation: Porque será que um teletransporte nos mandou para lá?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Viva, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This way looks a little dangerous...
dialogue.translation: Por aqui, parece um bocadinho perigoso...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I'm helping!
dialogue.translation: Estou a ajudar!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Captain!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I found something interesting around here - the same warp signature I saw when I landed!
dialogue.translation: Descobri algo interessante aqui... Tem a mesma assinatura de teletransporte que detetámos quando aterrámos!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Someone from the ship must be nearby...
dialogue.translation: Deve haver alguém da nave por perto...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This dimension is pretty exciting, isn't it?
dialogue.translation: Que dimensão interessante, não é?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: O que haverá por aqui?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any signs of Professor Vitellary?
dialogue.translation: Já há sinais do Professor Vitelino?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, not yet...
dialogue.translation: Infelizmente, ainda não...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope he's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que esteja bem...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thanks so much for saving me, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Obrigado por vires resgatar-me, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm so glad to be back!
dialogue.translation: Estou tão feliz por estar de volta!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: That lab was so dark and scary! I didn't like it at all...
dialogue.translation: Aquele laboratório era tão escuro e assustador! Não gostei nada daquilo...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Vitellary's back? I knew you'd find him!
dialogue.translation: O Vitelino já voltou? Eu sabia que ias encontrá-lo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I mean, I admit I was very worried that you wouldn't...
dialogue.translation: Quero dizer, confesso que cheguei a pensar que não o encontravas...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: or that something might have happened to him...
dialogue.translation: Ou que algo lhe tinha acontecido...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Buááá...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor Victoria? He's ok!
dialogue.translation: Doutora Verónica, então? Ele está bem!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh! Sorry! I was just thinking about what if he wasn't?
dialogue.translation: Claro, desculpa! Pus-me apenas a imaginar os piores cenários...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thank you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Obrigado, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You found Vermilion! Great!
dialogue.translation: Boa! Encontraste o Vermelhão!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wish he wasn't so reckless!
dialogue.translation: Ele devia ser mais cauteloso!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: He'll get himself into trouble...
dialogue.translation: Um dia vai meter-se em sarilhos a sério...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Verdigris is ok! Violet will be so happy!
dialogue.translation: O Verdusco está bem! A Violeta até vai pular de contente!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm happy!
dialogue.translation: Estou tão feliz!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Though I was very worried...
dialogue.translation: Mas estava cá numa aflição...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Why did the teleporter send us to that scary dimension?
dialogue.translation: Porque é que o teletransporte nos mandou para aquela dimensão assustadora?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What happened?
dialogue.translation: O que aconteceu?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know, Doctor...
dialogue.translation: Não sei, doutora...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Porquê?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Viva, comandante!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Are you going to try and find the rest of these shiny things?
dialogue.translation: Vais tentar encontrar o resto destas fichas brilhantes?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Hey Captain, I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Olá, comandante! Encontrei isto no tal laboratório...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Sabes para que serve?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Lamento, mas não faço ideia...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: They seem important, though...
dialogue.translation: Mas parecem ter alguma importância...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe something will happen if we find them all?
dialogue.translation: Talvez aconteça alguma coisa se encontrarmos todas!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Comandante! Vem cá ver no que ando a trabalhar!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It looks like these shiny things are giving off a strange energy reading!
dialogue.translation: Detetei uma estranha leitura de energia nestas fichas brilhantes!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Então, decidi analisá-las...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Comandante! Vem cá ver no que ando a trabalhar!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Encontrei isto no tal laboratório...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It seemed to be giving off a weird energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Detetei uma estranha leitura de energia...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Então, decidi analisar...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and I was able to find more of them with the ship's scanner!
dialogue.translation: O que me permitiu usar a sonda da nave para identificar outras!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: If you get a chance, it might be worth finding the rest of them!
dialogue.translation: Se poderes, talvez valha a pena encontra as restantes!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Don't put yourself in any danger, though!
dialogue.translation: Não corras riscos desnecessários!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...but it looks like you've already found all of them in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Mas... parece que já encontraste todas nesta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Hã? A sério?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah, well done! That can't have been easy!
dialogue.translation: Sim, bom trabalho! Não deve ter sido pera doce!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and they're related. They're all a part of something bigger!
dialogue.translation: E... há uma relação entre elas. Fazem todas parte de algo mais importante!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ah! A sério?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah! There seem to be twenty variations of the fundamental energy signature...
dialogue.translation: A sério! Parece que há vinte variações da assinatura de energia fundamental...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Espera lá...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Does that mean you've found all of them?
dialogue.translation: Isso quer dizer que encontraste todas?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm making some fascinating discoveries, captain!
dialogue.translation: Comandante, estou a fazer umas descobertas incríveis!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This isn't like any other dimension we've been to, Captain.
dialogue.translation: Esta dimensão não tem nada a ver com as que já encontrámos antes.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something strange about this place...
dialogue.translation: Passa-se algo de estranho por aqui...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain, have you noticed that this dimension seems to wrap around?
dialogue.translation: Comandante, já reparaste que esta dimensão parece teletransportar-nos de um lado para o outro?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it's strange...
dialogue.translation: Já. É mesmo estranho...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like this dimension is having the same stability problems as our own!
dialogue.translation: Parece que os problemas de estabilidade que detetámos na nossa dimensão, também estão presentes aqui!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope we're not the ones causing it...
dialogue.translation: Espero que não sejamos a origem do problema...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Do you think we might be?
dialogue.translation: Hã!? Pensas que poderia ser uma possibilidade?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: No no... that's very unlikely, really...
dialogue.translation: Não, não... Duvido muito, a sério...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: My guess is that whoever used to live here was experimenting with ways to stop the dimension from collapsing.
dialogue.translation: Diria que quem viveu aqui andava a fazer experiências para evitar o colapso desta dimensão.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It would explain why they've wrapped the edges...
dialogue.translation: Isso já explicaria o motivo dos teletransportes nas extremidades...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Hey, maybe that's what's causing the interference?
dialogue.translation: Ei, talvez isso seja a causa da anomalia!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder where the people who used to live here have gone?
dialogue.translation: Onde será que foram parar os habitantes desta dimensão?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think it's no coincidence that the teleporter was drawn to that dimension...
dialogue.translation: Não deve ter sido por acaso que o teletransporte foi atraído para aquela dimensão...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something there. I think it might be causing the interference that's stopping us from leaving...
dialogue.translation: Está lá alguma coisa e deve estar na origem da anomalia que nos impede de sair daqui...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm glad Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Ainda bem que o Verdusco se safou.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It'll be a lot easier to find some way out of here now that we can get the ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Agora que a nave está funcional, deve ser mais fácil arranjar uma forma de sair daqui!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, you've found Doctor Victoria? Excellent!
dialogue.translation: Ai encontraste a Doutora Verónica? Ótimo!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I have lots of questions for her!
dialogue.translation: Quero perguntar-lhe tanta coisa!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Vermilion says that he was trapped in some sort of tunnel?
dialogue.translation: É verdade que o Vermelhão ficou preso numa espécie de túnel?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it just seemed to keep going and going...
dialogue.translation: Sim... e parecia não ter fim...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Interesting... I wonder why it was built?
dialogue.translation: Que engraçado... Porque o terão construído?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's good to be back!
dialogue.translation: Adoro estar de volta!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've got so much work to catch up on...
dialogue.translation: Tenho tanto trabalho em atraso...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I know it's probably a little dangerous to stay here now that this dimension is collapsing...
dialogue.translation: Compreendo o risco que corremos em estar numa dimensão à beira do colapso, mas...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...but it's so rare to find somewhere this interesting!
dialogue.translation: É tão raro encontrar algo assim tão interessante!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the answers to our own problems here?
dialogue.translation: Talvez este seja o local onde encontraremos as respostas para os nossos próprios problemas!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been meaning to give this to you...
dialogue.translation: Comandante, queria dar-te isto...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Professor! Where did you find this?
dialogue.translation: Professor! Onde encontraste isto!?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh, it was just lying around that space station.
dialogue.translation: Oh, estava algures naquela estação espacial.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's a pity Doctor Victoria isn't here, she loves studying that sort of thing...
dialogue.translation: É uma pena não termos cá a Doutora Verónica. É o tipo de coisas que ela adoraria analisar...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Sabes para que serve?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Nope! But it is giving off a strange energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Não! Mas estou a detetar umas estranhas leituras de energia...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...so I used the ship's scanner to find more of them!
dialogue.translation: Por isso, usei a sonda da nave para identificar outras!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...Please don't let them distract you from finding Victoria, though!
dialogue.translation: Promete-me é que dás prioridade a encontrar a Verónica!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Espero que esteja bem...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Can't seem to detect any more of them nearby, though.
dialogue.translation: Não estou a detetar mais nenhuma por perto.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe you've found them all?
dialogue.translation: Talvez já tenhas encontrado todas!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back!
dialogue.translation: Ainda bem que voltaste!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Um, where's Captain Viridian?
dialogue.translation: Comandante Verdete! Ah, não. És tu...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ... Hello?
dialogue.translation: Olá?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is anyone there?
dialogue.translation: Está aí alguém?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
* DIMENSIONAL STABILITY GENERATOR *
[ Currently Generating ] Maximum Stability
[ Status ] Online
READY _
dialogue.translation:
* GERADOR DE ESTABILIDADE *
[ Saída Atual ] Estabilidade Máxima
[ Estado ] Online
PRONTO _

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Aha! This must be what's causing the interference!
dialogue.translation: Aha! Isto deve ser a origem da anomalia!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder if I can turn it off?
dialogue.translation: Será que dá para desligar?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: WARNING: Disabling the Dimensional Stability Generator may lead to instability! Are you sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation: AVISO: A desativação do gerador de estabilidade dimensional pode causar instabilidade! De certeza que queres fazer isto?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
Seriously! The whole dimension could collapse! Just think about this for a minute!
Are you really sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation:
A sério! Isto fará a dimensão colapsar completamente! Pensa lá mais um pouco!
Tens mesmo a certeza de que queres fazer isto?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
DIMENSIONAL STABILISER OFFLINE
dialogue.translation:
-= AVISO =-
ESTABILIZADOR DIMENSIONAL OFFLINE

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Oh, não...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Any moment now...
dialogue.translation: Está mesmo quase...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Olá!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You're alright!
dialogue.translation: Estás bem!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Eu sabia que te safavas!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We were very worried when you didn't come back...
dialogue.translation: Ficámos preocupadíssimos quando não voltaste...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: ...but when you turned off the source of the interference...
dialogue.translation: Mas depois de desligares a origem da anomalia...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...we were able to find you with the ship's scanners...
dialogue.translation: Conseguimos usar a sonda da nave para localizar-te...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...and teleport you back on board!
dialogue.translation: E teletransportar-te de volta!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That was lucky!
dialogue.translation: Que sorte!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Thanks guys!
dialogue.translation: Obrigado, pessoal!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...it looks like this dimension is starting to destabilise, just like our own...
dialogue.translation: Parece que esta dimensão está a começar a destabilizar como a nossa...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...we can stay and explore for a little longer, but...
dialogue.translation: Podíamos explorá-la mais um bocadinho, mas...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...eventually, it'll collapse completely.
dialogue.translation: Mas cedo ou mais tarde, vai colapsar de vez.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: There's no telling exactly how long we have here. But the ship's fixed, so...
dialogue.translation: Não sei ao certo quanto tempo nos resta, mas a nave está pronta a zarpar. Por isso...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...as soon as we're ready, we can go home!
dialogue.translation: Podemos seguir viagem para casa assim que quisermos!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What now, Captain?
dialogue.translation: E agora, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's find a way to save this dimension!
dialogue.translation: 'Bora procurar uma forma de salvar esta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: And a way to save our home dimension too!
dialogue.translation: E de caminho, ver se salvamos a nossa também!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The answer is out there, somewhere!
dialogue.translation: A solução tem de estar algures por aí!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Wow! You found all of them!
dialogue.translation: Uau! Encontraste todas!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Really? Great!
dialogue.translation: A sério? Boa!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'll run some tests and see if I can work out what they're for...
dialogue.translation: Vou fazer umas análises para ver se descubro para que servem...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That... that didn't sound good...
dialogue.translation: Isso... Isso não suou nada bem...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Outra vez, não!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Wait! It's stopped!
dialogue.translation: Calma... Já parou!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: This is where we were storing those shiny things? What happened?
dialogue.translation: Não era aqui que estávamos a guardar aquelas fichas brilhantes? O que aconteceu?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We were just playing with them, and...
dialogue.translation: Andávamos aqui na brincadeira com elas e...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...they suddenly exploded!
dialogue.translation: De repente, explodiram!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: But look what they made! Is that a teleporter?
dialogue.translation: Mas repara só no resultado! Será um teletransporte?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think so, but...
dialogue.translation: Parece, mas...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've never seen a teleporter like that before...
dialogue.translation: Nunca vi um assim...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We should investigate!
dialogue.translation: Devíamos investigar!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What do you think, Captain?
dialogue.translation: O que achas, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Should we find out where it leads?
dialogue.translation: Vamos ver onde vai dar?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! We're trapped!
dialogue.translation: Oh, não! Estamos presos!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh dear...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hmm... how should we get out of this?
dialogue.translation: Hum... Como é que nos desenrascamos desta?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Or, you know... we could have just warped back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Ou, sei lá... Podíamos simplesmente teletransportar-nos de volta para a nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Wow! What is this?
dialogue.translation: Uau! O que é isto!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like another laboratory!
dialogue.translation: Parece outro laboratório!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's have a look around!
dialogue.translation: Vamos dar uma espreitadela!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look at all this research! This is going to be a big help back home!
dialogue.translation: Reparem só nesta pesquisa toda! Dará um jeitão quando regressarmos a casa!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I wonder why they abandoned this dimension? They were so close to working out how to fix it...
dialogue.translation: Porque será que abandonaram esta dimensão? Estavam mesmo quase a salvá-la...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Maybe we can fix it for them? Maybe they'll come back?
dialogue.translation: Talvez nós possamos fazê-lo! Será que isso faria com que voltassem?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: This lab is amazing! The scientists who worked here know a lot more about warp technology than we do!
dialogue.translation: Que laboratório espetacular! Os cientistas que trabalharam aqui percebiam muito mais sobre tecnologia de teletransporte, do que nós!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you seen this?
dialogue.translation: Já viste isto, comandante?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: With their research and ours, we should be able to stabilise our own dimension!
dialogue.translation: Se combinarmos a pesquisa deles com a nossa, devemos conseguir estabilizar a nossa dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We're saved!
dialogue.translation: Estamos salvos!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Look what I found!
dialogue.translation: Vejam só o que encontrei!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's pretty hard, I can only last for about 10 seconds...
dialogue.translation: É superdifícil. Só duro uns 10 segundos...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Songs will continue to play until you leave the ship.
Collect trinkets to unlock new songs!
dialogue.translation:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Toca música continuamente até saíres da nave.
Coleciona fichas para desbloquear mais músicas!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 5 Trinkets
Pushing Onwards
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 5 fichas
Pushing Onwards

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 8 Trinkets
Positive Force
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 8 fichas
Positive Force

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 10 Trinkets
Presenting VVVVVV
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 10 fichas
Presenting VVVVVV

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 12 Trinkets
Potential for Anything
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 12 fichas
Potential for Anything

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 14 Trinkets
Pressure Cooker
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 14 fichas
Pressure Cooker

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 16 Trinkets
Predestined Fate
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 16 fichas
Predestined Fate

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 18 Trinkets
Popular Potpourri
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 18 fichas
Popular Potpourri

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 20 Trinkets
Pipe Dream
dialogue.translation:
DESBLOQUEIO SEGUINTE: 20 fichas
Pipe Dream

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= REGISTO PESSOAL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Almost everyone has been evacuated from the space station now. The rest of us are leaving in a couple of days, once our research has been completed.
dialogue.translation: Já evacuámos quase toda a gente da estação espacial. O resto vai daqui a uns dias, quando concluirmos a pesquisa.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas da Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...everything collapses, eventually. It's the way of the universe.
dialogue.translation: Eventualmente, tudo acaba por colapsar... É a lei do universo.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I wonder if the generator we set up in the polar dimension is what's affecting our teleporters?
dialogue.translation: Será que os nossos teletransportes estão a ser afetados pelo gerador que colocámos na dimensão polar?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: No, it's probably just a glitch.
dialogue.translation: Não, isto deve ser apenas uma falhazita.

cutscene.explanation: a trinket that's difficult to get

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= REGISTO PESSOAL =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Hah! Nobody will ever get this one.
dialogue.translation: Hah! Ninguém vai conseguir apanhar esta.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...The other day I was chased down a hallway by a giant cube with the word AVOID on it.
dialogue.translation: No outro dia tive um cubo gigante a perseguir-me por um corredor. Até tinha a palavra ''EVITAR'' nele.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: These security measures go too far!
dialogue.translation: Estas medidas de segurança estão a ir longe demais!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: The only way into my private lab anymore is by teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Já só consigo chegar ao meu laboratório pessoal por teletransporte.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've made sure that it's difficult for unauthorised personnel to gain access.
dialogue.translation: Evitei ao máximo que pessoal não autorizado conseguisse aceder-lhe.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas da Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... our first breakthrough was the creation of the inversion plane, which creates a mirrored dimension beyond a given event horizon ...
dialogue.translation: ... o primeiro progresso que fizemos, foi após criarmos o plano de inversão. Algo que nos permite criar uma dimensão invertida para além de um ponto no horizonte...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas da Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...with just a small modification to the usual parameters, we were able to stabilise an infinite tunnel!
dialogue.translation: ... bastou apenas fazer alguns ajustes aos parâmetros habituais, para conseguirmos estabilizar um túnel infinito!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas da Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... the final step in creating the dimensional stabiliser was to create a feedback loop ...
dialogue.translation: ... o último passo para a criação de um estabilizador dimensional era criarmos uma retroalimentação...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas da Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...despite our best efforts, the dimensional stabiliser won't hold out forever. Its collapse is inevitable...
dialogue.translation: ... fizemos o melhor que podemos. Ironicamente, não conseguimos estabilizar o estabilizador dimensional. Eventualmente, irá colapsar...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Huh? These coordinates aren't even in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Hã!? Estas coordenadas nem são nesta dimensão!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Personal Log =-
dialogue.translation: -= Registo Pessoal =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... I've had to seal off access to most of our research. Who knows what could happen if it fell into the wrong hands? ...
dialogue.translation: Tive de vedar o acesso à maior parte da nossa pesquisa. Sabe-se lá o que poderia acontecer se fosse parar às mãos erradas...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Notas da Pesquisa =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... access to the control center is still possible through the main atmospheric filters ...
dialogue.translation: ... ainda é possível aceder ao centro de controlo através da filtragem atmosférica principal...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... it turns out the key to stabilising this dimension was to create a balancing force outside of it!
dialogue.translation: ... parece que, tudo o que precisávamos para estabilizar esta dimensão, era criar uma força equivalente fora dela!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Though it looks like that's just a temporary solution, at best.
dialogue.translation: Mas parece que isto não passará de uma solução temporária.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've been working on something more permanent, but it seems it's going to be too late...
dialogue.translation: Estou a ver se arranjo uma solução mais permanente, mas parece que será tarde demais...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ?SYNTAX ERROR
dialogue.translation: ?ERRO DE SINTAXE

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Now that the ship is fixed, we can leave anytime we want!
dialogue.translation: Agora que temos a nave consertada, podemos ir embora quando quisermos!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We've all agreed to keep exploring this dimension, though.
dialogue.translation: Mas concordámos em explorar esta dimensão mais um pouco.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Who knows what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Sabe-se lá o que poderemos encontrar!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= SHIP RADIO =-
[ Status ] Broadcasting
dialogue.translation:
-= COMUNICADOR DA NAVE =-
[ Estado ] A transmitir

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
The Super-Gravitron is intended for entertainment purposes only.
dialogue.translation:
-= AVISO =-
O Supergravitão dever ser usado exclusivamente para fins de entretenimento.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Anyone found using the Super Gravitron for educational purposes may be asked to stand in the naughty corner.
dialogue.translation: Quem se atrever a usar o Supergravitão para fins didáticos, poderá ser forçado a ir para o cantinho dos malcomportados.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Ship Navigation Controls
dialogue.translation:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Controlos de Navegação da Nave

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Error! Error! Cannot isolate dimensional coordinates! Interference detected!
dialogue.translation: Erro! Erro! Não é possível isolar as coordenadas dimensionais! Anomalia detetada!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: ...oh, I've already found this.
dialogue.translation: ...ah, já tinha encontrado este.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Please disable invincibility and/or slowdown before entering the Super Gravitron.
dialogue.translation: Desativa a invencibilidade e/ou câmara lenta antes de entrar no Supergravitão.
